ygData.subject: Re: efrium
ygData.msgSnippet: That s exactly how it SHOULD be!  If you ve ever fought the frenzied, he sure as heck isn t hitting normal speed when he wears the sash, so I think that the
ygData.messageBody:
That's exactly how it SHOULD be! If you've ever
fought the frenzied, he sure as heck isn't hitting
normal speed when he wears the sash, so I think that
the Executioner should use his weapon AND have it proc
too!

...just my 2 cp, but he's WAY too easy as it is now

Gazamel Prime
